title: The Final Key
description: With two seals broken, the beast is hours from breaching Emberheart. You must storm the Restricted Bestiary to seize the 'Depth-Bane Harpoon', the only weapon capable of killing the Leviathan.

turns.narrative: The Bestiary is guarded by towering Bronze Minotaurs built to protect dangerous artifacts.
turns.choice_a: Use lightning magic to overload their bronze chassis
turns.consequence_a: Extremely effective. They lock up, unable to move while you walk past them.
turns.choice_b: Use heavy crushing weapons to shatter their joints
turns.consequence_b: A brutally tough physical fight. You exhaust yourself significantly dismantling them.

turns.narrative: The Depth-Bane Harpoon is encased in a stasis field. The control panel requires a complex arcane cypher.
turns.choice_a: Hack the cipher perfectly using raw Intelligence
turns.consequence_a: The stasis fades safely. You secure the legendary weapon.
turns.choice_b: Smash the stasis projector with raw Strength
turns.consequence_b: The field violently implodes, severely burning you with arcane energy before dropping the Harpoon.

harpoon_secured_clean.description: You flawlessly secured the Depth-Bane Harpoon without taking damage.

harpoon_secured_burned.description: You secured the Harpoon, but suffered severe arcane burns.

conclusion: You flawlessly secured the Depth-Bane Harpoon without taking damage.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
